    Donate to NavGurukul

    When you fund education of a child at NavGurukul - you enable a child to fulfil his dreams and also take active part in solving problems of his/her community. Additionally, most of the students voluntarily pay-forward to sponsor the education of incoming students making this proces sustainable. Your penny thus is every year helping another student.

    You can donate directly to our Bank Account without any charges:

    UPI Id navgurukulf@kotak
    Name Navgurukul Foundation for Social Welfare
    Account Number 0512251778
    IFSC Code KKBK0004260

    Or you can pay directly (2% charge but superfast) using the following option:

    Looking forward to achieving great things together.
